content:
# The attempt to insert iron ore into the furnace failed because it appears that we do not have any iron ore left in our inventory. 
# The furnace is still showing "NO_INGREDIENTS" and has 6 iron plates produced so far, but it cannot operate without iron ore.

# At this point, we need to gather more iron ore to continue the smelting process. 
# Let's locate the nearest iron ore patch and harvest some more iron ore.

iron_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_position)  # Move to the nearest iron ore resource patch
harvest_resource(iron_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest 10 iron ore

print(f"Inventory after harvesting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
